hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT DOCUMENT_ID, ASSIGNED_TO, BUSINESS_GROUP_ID, CREATED_BY, TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS CREATION_DATE, DESCRIPTION, DOCUMENT_FILE_NAME, DOCUMENT_NAME, DOCUMENT_SOURCE, DOCUMENT_SUB_TYPE, DOCUMENT_TYPE, TO_CHAR(DUE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS DUE_DATE, TO_CHAR(EXPIRY_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS EXPIRY_DATE, FINANCIAL_YEAR, TO_CHAR(FOLLOW_UP_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS FOLLOW_UP_DATE, IS_ACTIVE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS LAST_UPDATE_DATE, MASTER_DOCUMENT_ID, ORGANISATION_ID, PERSON_ID, PROFILE_D_ID, RECEIVED_BY, TO_CHAR(RECEIVED_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS RECEIVED_DATE, RECEIVE_COMMENTS, SENT_BY, TO_CHAR(SENT_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS SENT_DATE, STATUS, STATUS_DETAIL FROM HR_DOCUMENT WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy}

INSERT INTO HR_DOCUMENT ( DOCUMENT_ID, ASSIGNED_TO, BUSINESS_GROUP_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, DESCRIPTION, DOCUMENT_FILE_NAME, DOCUMENT_NAME, DOCUMENT_SOURCE, DOCUMENT_SUB_TYPE, DOCUMENT_TYPE, DUE_DATE, EXPIRY_DATE, FINANCIAL_YEAR, FOLLOW_UP_DATE, IS_ACTIVE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, MASTER_DOCUMENT_ID, ORGANISATION_ID, PERSON_ID, PROFILE_D_ID, RECEIVED_BY, RECEIVED_DATE, RECEIVE_COMMENTS, SENT_BY, SENT_DATE, STATUS, STATUS_DETAIL ) VALUES ( ${DOCUMENT_ID}, ${ASSIGNED_TO}, ${BUSINESS_GROUP_ID}, ${CREATED_BY}, ${CREATION_DATE}, ${DESCRIPTION}, ${DOCUMENT_FILE_NAME}, ${DOCUMENT_NAME}, ${DOCUMENT_SOURCE}, ${DOCUMENT_SUB_TYPE}, ${DOCUMENT_TYPE}, ${DUE_DATE}, ${EXPIRY_DATE}, ${FINANCIAL_YEAR}, ${FOLLOW_UP_DATE}, ${IS_ACTIVE}, ${LAST_UPDATED_BY}, ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}, ${MASTER_DOCUMENT_ID}, ${ORGANISATION_ID}, ${PERSON_ID}, ${PROFILE_D_ID}, ${RECEIVED_BY}, ${RECEIVED_DATE}, ${RECEIVE_COMMENTS}, ${SENT_BY}, ${SENT_DATE}, ${STATUS}, ${STATUS_DETAIL} )

UPDATE HR_DOCUMENT SET ASSIGNED_TO = ${ASSIGNED_TO}, BUSINESS_GROUP_ID = ${BUSINESS_GROUP_ID}, CREATED_BY = ${CREATED_BY}, CREATION_DATE = ${CREATION_DATE}, DESCRIPTION = ${DESCRIPTION}, DOCUMENT_FILE_NAME = ${DOCUMENT_FILE_NAME}, DOCUMENT_NAME = ${DOCUMENT_NAME}, DOCUMENT_SOURCE = ${DOCUMENT_SOURCE}, DOCUMENT_SUB_TYPE = ${DOCUMENT_SUB_TYPE}, DOCUMENT_TYPE = ${DOCUMENT_TYPE}, DUE_DATE = ${DUE_DATE}, EXPIRY_DATE = ${EXPIRY_DATE}, FINANCIAL_YEAR = ${FINANCIAL_YEAR}, FOLLOW_UP_DATE = ${FOLLOW_UP_DATE}, IS_ACTIVE = ${IS_ACTIVE}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = ${LAST_UPDATED_BY}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}, MASTER_DOCUMENT_ID = ${MASTER_DOCUMENT_ID}, ORGANISATION_ID = ${ORGANISATION_ID}, PERSON_ID = ${PERSON_ID}, PROFILE_D_ID = ${PROFILE_D_ID}, RECEIVED_BY = ${RECEIVED_BY}, RECEIVED_DATE = ${RECEIVED_DATE}, RECEIVE_COMMENTS = ${RECEIVE_COMMENTS}, SENT_BY = ${SENT_BY}, SENT_DATE = ${SENT_DATE}, STATUS = ${STATUS}, STATUS_DETAIL = ${STATUS_DETAIL} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}
